constraints.name: path_avoidance
constraints.description: 路径不能经过障碍物、宝藏和炸弹

constraints.name: closed_path
constraints.description: 路径必须是闭合的，起点和终点相同

constraints.name: bomb_exclusion
constraints.description: 闭合路径内部不能包含炸弹

constraints.name: profit_calculation
constraints.description: 路径收益为路径内部宝藏价值总和减去路径长度
